Need a 3rd dimension in your #ggplot output?

Video attached of work-in-progress on {devoutrgl}. This is why I wanted {zstdlite}.

ggplot(mtcars) + geom_point3d(aes(mpg, wt, z = disp, size = disp, colour = as.factor(cyl)))
